Interface ExceptionHandler

All Known Implementing Classes:
CliExceptionHandler, GuiExceptionHandler
public interface ExceptionHandler
This interface defines methods for handling different types of exceptions that may occur during the execution of a client application. Implementations of this interface can provide custom behavior based on the exception type, such as logging, user notification, or recovery mechanisms.
